channel.title: SFoL 64 - Anonymous FoL - Day 6 - The Possessor, Inquisitor, and Fool are victorious!
channel.description:
![image|690x249](upload://lFVuKgyw31h4NG2eU4qQYTeRrsW.png)
### Welcome to SFoL64: Anonymous FoL!
## Rules Follow the https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244, and the https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926. Please make sure you have enough time for this game before you sign up.
## Gameplay
* Days are 48 hours long or until an execution ends it, Nights last 24 hours. The first day is an exception, it lasts only 24 hours and has no execution. * You will be provided a DM with your classcard by the host, send your actions there. * Unseen/Cult will talk through a special Discord server or forum message. * The priest will speak with the dead through a separate Discord server or forum message. * All classes will be used as they are found in this thread: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998
## Executions
* To accuse someone say “/vote [player]”. Please make the life of the hosts easier by bolding it (by putting ** ** around it) * Should the votes reach the majority, that player will be executed and the day will end. * When the day ends, the player with the most votes will be executed. * Voting "/no lynch" is an option. * You may self vote now.
## Picking a New King
* If there are less than 4 players a new king will not be selected. * When the king dies a 12 hour period starts. In this, players may vote in their class PM for who they want to become the next king. * Whoever receives the most votes in this period will be crowned king. If votes are tied, a king election will be held the next day to determine it.
## Action Results
You find all possible night feedback here: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-hosting-feedback-guide/75082
[details="Action order"]
Night abilities will be processed in following order/priority: 1. Visit Prevention 2. Occupation 3. Targetted redirection 4. Non targetted redirection (like Tavernkeeper) 5. Killing 6. Protection 7. Miscellaneous Effects (like Bounty) 8. Investigation 1 (Faction checks, type checks, etc) 9. Conversion 10. Investigation 2 (Every kind of investigation which checks for abilities used *this* night)
In case there are conflicts on the same level (example: two Drunks try to redirect the same player), all these conflicting effects are canceled.
(thx Geyde) [/details]
## Journals
DM the host what you want on your journal. When you die, the last update to your journal will be revealed to everyone. It has a character limit of 1000 characters.
## Classlist
**King** **(65% [color = steblue]Good[/color], 35% [color = purple]Evil[/color] / [color = scarlet]Devout[/color])** **[color = purple]Mastermind[/color]** / **[color = scarlet]Cult Leader[/color]** **[color = purple]Assassin[/color]** / **[color = scarlet]Random Cult[/color]** **[color = steblue]Prince[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** **[color = steblue]Random Blue Dragon[/color]** / **[color = grey]Random Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color = grey]Random Neutral Non-Killer[/color]** **[color = grey]Neutral Killer[/color]**
### You can find all classes here: https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998
## Playerlist 1. ~~Gilbert_Lovell~~ - **Executed D3 - [color=steblue]The Chronomancer[/color]** 2. ~~Peter_Carew~~ ~~Peter_Carew~~ ~~Peter_Carew~~ - **Executed D3 - [color=steblue]The Noble[/color]** 3. ~~Geoffrey_Bailey~~ - **Dead N4 - [color=darkred]The Cabalist[/color]** 4. ~~Mary_Savill~~ - **Executed D5 - [color=steblue]The Alchemist[/color]** 5. ~~Andy_Bernard~~ - **Dead N3 - [color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color]** 6. ~~Alan_Atlee :crown:~~ - **Dead N2 - [color=steblue]The Good King[/color]** 7. ~~Sarah_Lacey~~ - **Dead N5 - [color=red]The Psy[/color][color=orange]chopat[/color][color=yellow]hic Kin[/color][color=green]g[/color]** 8. ~~Lucy_Wrenne~~ - **Dead N1 - [color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color]** 9. ~~Jane_Drayton :crown:~~ - **Dead N3 - [color=steblue]The Good King[/color]** 10. ~~Susan_Ailemer~~ - **Dead N1 - [color=steblue]The Observer[/color]** 11. ~~Emma_Maison~~ - **Executed D4 - [color=darkred]The Acolyte[/color]** 12. ~~Nicolas_Adams~~ - **Dead N2 - [color=steblue]The Observer[/color]** 13. ~~Thomas_Scott~~ Thomas_The_Second - **[color=pink]The Fool[/color]** 14. ~~Isabel_Savage~~ - **Died D3 - [color=lavender]The Inquisitor[/color]** 15. Alice_Alard - **[color=darkblue]The Possessor[/color]** 16. ~~Ivo_Wake~~ - **Dead N4 - [color=steblue]The Prince[/color]** 17. ~~Edmond_Bailey :crown:~~ - **Dead N5 - [color=steblue]The Good King[/color]** 18. ~~Helen_Harte~~ - **Dead N2 - [color=darkred]The Cabalist[/color]**
# To spectate or backup, please DM me *and* @Arete on the forums, or DM me on discord (kat#0420). ___
# Thread Summary
[**EoD1: Nobody died, obviously!**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-64-anonymous-fol-night-1-18-18/83777/1513?u=katze) **[EoN1:](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-64-anonymous-fol-night-1-18-18/83777/1518?u=katze)** [color=steblue]**Lucy_Wrenne**[/color] and [color=steblue]**Susan_Ailemer**[/color] dead! [**EoD2:**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-64-anonymous-fol-day-2-16-18/83777/3133?u=katze) **Nobody died!** [**EoN2:**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-64-anonymous-fol-day-3-13-18/83777/3135?u=katze) [color=steblue]**Alan_Atlee** :crown:[/color], [color=steblue]**Nicolas_Adams**[/color], and [color=darkred]**Helen_Harte**[/color] dead! [**D3:**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-64-anonymous-fol-day-3-13-18/83777/3419?u=katze) All hail King **Jane_Drayton** :crown:! [**D3 Bounty:**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-64-anonymous-fol-day-3-13-18/83777/3597?u=katze) **[color=steblue]Gilbert_Lovell[/color]** dead! [**EoD3:**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-64-anonymous-fol-night-3-10-18/83777/4107?u=katze) [color=steblue]**Peter_Carew**[/color] and [color=lavender]**Isabel_Savage**[/color] dead! [**EoN3:**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-64-anonymous-fol-day-4-8-18/83777/4110?u=katze) [color=steblue]**Jane_Drayton :crown:**[/color] and [color=steblue]**Andy Bernard**[/color] dead! [**D4:**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-64-anonymous-fol-day-4-8-18/83777/4523?u=katze) All hail King **Edmond_Bailey** :crown:! [**EoD4:**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-64-anonymous-fol-day-4-8-18/83777/4617?u=katze) **[color=darkred]Emma_Maison[/color]** dead! [**EoN4:**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-64-anonymous-fol-night-4-7-18/83777/4620?u=katze) **[color=darkred]Geoffrey_Bailey[/color]** and **[color=steblue]Ivo_Wake[/color]** dead! [**EoD5:**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-64-anonymous-fol-night-5-4-18/83777/5228?u=katze) [color=steblue]**Mary_Savill**[/color] dead! [**EoN5:**](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfol-64-anonymous-fol-day-6-the-possessor-inquisitor-and-fool-are-victorious/83777/5233?u=katze) **The Possessor, Inquisitor, and Fool are victorious!**
## Professional Tip from your favorite katze:
To make playing on an alt easier and reduce the chances of accidentally posting/typing on your main account, I highly recommend you do one of the following two things:
**A: Play this game (and other alt-games) on a different browser** *(or in incognito/private mode)* **B: Use a browser extension such as [Firefox Multi-Account Containers](https://addons.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/addon/multi-account-containers/).** There is probably an equivalent of this extension on Chrome as well, but I can only *personally* advocate for the Firefox one.
Regardless of which above option you choose (if any), I believe it is *nearly essential* to have a different site theme on your alternative account. If you use Dark mode, I'd recommend using Light, or Amber if you're careful. I do not take responsibility for any blindness afflicted doing this.
<small>This is doubly important if you are stupid like me and somehow post on the wrong account despite having a different theme and container.</small>
